item.title: R + binder = interactive Jupyter notebooks in the cloud
item.description: Have you ever found a GitHub repository with an interesting R package? Probably yes. How cool would it be to try it out without having to deal with installation and dependencies? Fortunately, it is possible thanks to the BinderHub - the server technology that turns computational material (e.g. Jupyter Notebook) into interactive computational environments in the cloud. Here you can see an example of such interactive notebook.
